title: xplat package needs build number in version
body: We can't take a new drop without a new version. @ValMenn

nodes.body: We merged this change. We're not clear if you're asking something other than that? Let us know.

Basically we need a new package with the fix, but the version has to be different.

When we build a NuGet package it doesn't have any revision number. Rebuilding the package will give us the exact same id as a result.
Doesn't manually changing version in nuspec file work?

You can, of course. Was looking for something that would facilitate getting drops from an automated build.

If everything is manual, that's fine. As long as we have a documented process to request new package drops. Ideally published in a known place (nuget.org?).
